title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.13 - Time between heats
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.13 - Time between heats

State Regulations

The time between heats for any distance up to and
including a mile shall be not less than 25 minutes; for any distance between
one and two miles, 30 minutes. No heat shall be called after sunset where the
track is not lighted for night racing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4117.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
